statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM inventory WHERE optimal_stock_level < 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, delivery_schedule FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_level BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock_level, optimal_stock_level FROM inventory ORDER BY current_stock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, optimal_stock_level FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_level < 20 ORDER BY optimal_stock_level ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_level BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY current_stock_level DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, optimal_stock_level FROM inventory WHERE delivery_schedule ->> 'day' = 'Monday' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels
SELECT quantity, last_updated, product_id FROM inventory_levels
SELECT delivery_date, quantity_delivered, product_id FROM delivery_schedules
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_schedules WHERE quantity_delivered < 50
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity <= 50
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_date
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels JOIN delivery_schedules ON inventory_levels.product_id = delivery_schedules.product_id
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < reorder_level;
SELECT product_name, delivery_date FROM inventory INNER JOIN delivery_schedule ON inventory.product_id = delivery_schedule.product_id;
SELECT * FROM stockout_history WHERE stockout_reason = 'Out of Stock';
SELECT product_name, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM stockout_history);
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < reorder_level;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, delivery_date FROM inventory JOIN delivery_schedule ON inventory.product_id = delivery_schedule.product_id;
SELECT product_name, stockout_date FROM inventory JOIN stockout_history ON inventory.product_id = stockout_history.product_id WHERE stockout_reason = 'Out of Stock';

SELECT product_name, stock_level, delivery_schedule.delivery_date FROM inventory JOIN delivery_schedule ON inventory.product_id = delivery_schedule.product_id WHERE delivery_schedule.delivery_date > CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Company%';
SELECT inventory.id, inventory.product_name, delivery_schedule.delivery_date FROM inventory INNER JOIN delivery_schedule ON inventory.id = delivery_schedule.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory JOIN delivery_schedule ON inventory.id = delivery_schedule.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.id = suppliers.id WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, email FROM supplier WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedule WHERE status='Scheduled' ORDER BY delivery_date, delivery_time;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier WHERE contact_person='John Doe'
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_time, status FROM delivery_schedule ORDER BY delivery_date ASC, delivery_time DESC
SELECT product_id, current_stock, reorder_level FROM stock_levels WHERE current_stock < reorder_level
